title: ID: font used in wartime posters
content:
Looking for fonts used in WW2 propaganda posters (particularly UK)m this is one example I am having a harder time with..  
[edit] sorry about the ridiculous (and against rules) image first uploaded, I forgot to resize, I only cropped. Here it is, but decent sized.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140410091124im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wrens_5918.jpg)

Thanks for any help
author: travistravis

comments.content: I may have found it on my own, or at least I found one close enough I think. For anyone curious, Sahara Bodoni
